1    | /**************************************************************************
2    | $Header: v_font.c Mon 11-13-2000 1:54:48 pm HvA V1.00 $
3    | 
4    | Low level video font routines
5    | ***************************************************************************/
6    | 
7    | #include <stdio.h>
8    | #include <stdlib.h>
9    | #include <dos.h>
10   | #include <bios.h>
11   | #include <sys\movedata.h>
12   | #include "v_video.h"
13   | 
14   | /*+ External varialbes +*/
15   | extern SCREEN _cursvar;
16   | extern int _default_lines;
17   | 
18   | /*+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
19   | v_get_font() - Get the current font size
20   | This function returns the current font size.  This function only
21   | works if the #define FAST_VIDEO is true.
22   | ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++*/
23   | int v_get_font(void)
24   | {
25   | #if defined (FAST_VIDEO)
26   |     int retval=0;
27   | #endif
28   | 
29   | #if defined (FAST_VIDEO)
30   |     retval = getdosmemword (0x485);
31   |     if ((retval == 0) && (_cursvar.adapter == _MDS_GENIUS))
32   |     {
33   |         retval = _FONT15; /* Assume the MDS Genius is in 66 line mode. */
34   |     }
35   |     switch (_cursvar.adapter)
36   |     {
37   |     case _MDA:
38   |             retval = 10; /* POINTS is not certain on MDA/Hercules */
39   |             break;
40   |     case _EGACOLOR:
41   |     case _EGAMONO:
42   |         switch (retval)
43   |         {
44   |         case _FONT8:
45   |         case _FONT14:
46   |             break;
47   |         default:
48   |             retval = _FONT14;
49   |         }
50   |         break;
51   | 
52   |     case _VGACOLOR:
53   |     case _VGAMONO:
54   |         switch (retval)
55   |         {
56   |         case _FONT8:
57   |         case _FONT14:
58   |         case _FONT16:
59   |             break;
60   |         default:
61   |             break;
62   |         }
63   |         break;
64   |     default:
65   |         break;
66   |     }
67   |     return( retval );
68   | 
69   | #endif
70   | 
71   |     return(0);
72   | }
73   | 
74   | 
75   | /*+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
76   | v_set_font()
77   | This routine sets the current font size, if the adapter allows
78   | such a change.
79   | ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++*/
80   | int v_set_font(int size)
81   | {
82   |   union REGS regs;
83   | 
84   |   if (_cursvar.bogus_adapter)
85   |       return( ERR );
86   | 
87   |   switch (_cursvar.adapter)
88   |   {
89   |     case _CGA:
90   |     case _MDA:
91   |     case _MCGACOLOR:
92   |     case _MCGAMONO:
93   |     case _MDS_GENIUS:
94   |         break;
95   | 
96   |     case _EGACOLOR:
97   |     case _EGAMONO:
98   |         if (_cursvar.sizeable && (_cursvar.font != size))
99   |         {
100  |             switch (size)
101  |             {
102  |             case _FONT8:
103  |                 regs.h.ah = 0x11;
104  |                 regs.h.al = 0x12;
105  |                 regs.h.bl = 0x00;
106  |                 int86(0x10, &regs, &regs);
107  |                 break;
108  |             case _FONT14:
109  |                 regs.h.ah = 0x11;
110  |                 regs.h.al = 0x11;
111  |                 regs.h.bl = 0x00;
112  |                 int86(0x10, &regs, &regs);
113  |                 break;
114  |             default:
115  |                 break;
116  |             }
117  |         }
118  |         break;
119  | 
120  |     case _VGACOLOR:
121  |     case _VGAMONO:
122  |         if (_cursvar.sizeable && (_cursvar.font != size))
123  |         {
124  |             switch (size)
125  |             {
126  |             case _FONT8:
127  |                 regs.h.ah = 0x11;
128  |                 regs.h.al = 0x12;
129  |                 regs.h.bl = 0x00;
130  |                 int86(0x10, &regs, &regs);
131  |                 break;
132  |             case _FONT14:
133  |                 regs.h.ah = 0x11;
134  |                 regs.h.al = 0x11;
135  |                 regs.h.bl = 0x00;
136  |                 int86(0x10, &regs, &regs);
137  |                 break;
138  |             case _FONT16:
139  |                 regs.h.ah = 0x11;
140  |                 regs.h.al = 0x14;
141  |                 regs.h.bl = 0x00;
142  |                 int86(0x10, &regs, &regs);
143  |                 break;
144  |             default:
145  |                 break;
146  |             }
147  |         }
148  |         break;
149  |     default:
150  |         break;
151  |   }
152  | 
153  |   if (_cursvar.visible_cursor)
154  |       v_cursoron();
155  |   else
156  |       v_cursoroff();
157  | 
158  |   _cursvar.font = v_get_font();
159  | 
160  |   return( OK );
161  | }
162  | 
163  | /*+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
164  | v_set_80x25()   - force a known screen state: 80x25 text mode.
165  | ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++*/
166  | int v_set_80x25(void)
167  | {
168  |   union REGS regs;
169  | 
170  |   switch (_cursvar.adapter)
171  |   {
172  |     case _CGA:
173  |     case _EGACOLOR:
174  |     case _EGAMONO:
175  |     case _VGACOLOR:
176  |     case _VGAMONO:
177  |     case _MCGACOLOR:
178  |     case _MCGAMONO:
179  |         regs.h.ah = 0x00;
180  |         regs.h.al = 0x03;
181  |         int86(0x10, &regs, &regs);
182  |         break;
183  |     case _MDA:
184  |         regs.h.ah = 0x00;
185  |         regs.h.al = 0x07;
186  |         int86(0x10, &regs, &regs);
187  |     default:
188  |         break;
189  |   }
190  |   return( OK );
191  | }
192  | 
193  | 
194  | 
195  |
